target.name: init
target.description: Create the output directories. Do nothing if directories were already created.

target.name: export
target.description: Synchronizes build space contents with project.

target.name: dist
target.description: Creates a ZIP file. Suitable for distribution but building takes longer. See dist-deflate for faster builds.

target.name: dist-deflate
target.description: Creates a datapack ZIP file with NO compression (bigger ZIP file but faster than regular dist target)

target.name: clean
target.description: Deletes the whole build space and existing packages.

target.name: distclean
target.description: Deletes the datapack distribution ZIP file only, preserving synchronized build files.
